sentences.english: How can I cast away all my cares and worries ?
sentences.chinese: 如何才能将所有的担心忧虑置之脑后呢？

sentences.english: She devested herself of my advice.
sentences.chinese: 她把我的忠告置之脑后。

definition: to give no thought to/to have no regard for/to disregard
beyond the topmost clouds (idiom)/unimaginably far away

lit. wind past your ear/fig. sth you don't pay much attention to/in one ear and out the other
to neglect/to misuse/to mistreat/to abuse

to take a laissez-faire attitude
to act as one thinks fit/to have one's own way
to turn a deaf ear to (idiom); to pretend not to hear
to block one's ears and not listen (idiom); to turn a deaf ear
to let (sth happen)/to allow (sb to do sth)/to submit to/to yield
